attributes.action: Ban Greenpeace campaigning against issues vital to the future of Great Britain's interests at home and world wide.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WIND FARMS AND SOLAR PANELS ARE NOT ENOUGH!
The organisation greenpeace would sooner have us all live in the dark than enable us to create any kind of secure future for our children. By preventing their protests more people will see that we need nuclear power as our next main energy source.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
